title: Wrestling at the 1984 Summer Olympics – Men's Greco-Roman 90 kg
text:
The Men's Greco-Roman 90 kg at the <a href="1984%20Summer%20Olympics">1984 Summer Olympics</a> as part of the <a href="Wrestling%20at%20the%201984%20Summer%20Olympics">wrestling program</a> were held at the <a href="Anaheim%20Convention%20Center">Anaheim Convention Center</a>, <a href="Anaheim%2C%20California">Anaheim</a>, <a href="California">California</a>.
Tournament results.
The wrestlers are divided into 2 groups. The winner of each group decided by a double-elimination system.
